typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> movies
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'filename',
	partitionRootPath: 'movies',
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['output/parts/movies/**/*.parquet']) ~> source1
Filter1 derive(movie = '999979',
		title = 'Mark Story') ~> DerivedColumn1
movies filter(title == 'Toy Story') ~> Filter1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title = movies@title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		RottonTomato = {Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
source1 filter(ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> Filter2
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		year
	)) ~> sink1
